metadata.title: CVE-2022-38477 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla developer Nika Layzell and the Mozilla Fuzzing Team reported memorysafety bugs present in Firefox 103 and Firefox ESR 102.1. Some of thesebugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enougheffort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 102.2, Thunderbird < 102.2, and Firefox< 104.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
